p: Compounds 1a-1c were synthesized by condensation method. The compounds 1a-1c physicochemical data are represented in Table 4 and its catalyst performance is shown in Table 5. The compounds were confirmed via FT-IR, 1H and 3C NMR spectra, and elemental analyses. The IR absorption bands of compound 1a show the frequency range between 2584 and 2596 and 3239 and 3246 cm −1 corresponding to the C=N and NH groups, respectively.
